attributes.action: Key workers to get bonuses for all of their hard work through the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: As a high risk person myself, and watching my mum, dad, aunt and multiple family friends and friends working as key workers all throughout lockdown has shown me that they really do deserve some extra recognition and even support for getting us all through this lockdown.
attributes.background: For key workers to get the recognition and bonuses that they deserve for risking their lives and often sacrificing time from their families to ensure that they kept the country going.
